title: Hermann Bosch
text: Hermann Bosch (10 March 1891 – 15 November 1916) was a <a href="German%20Empire">German</a> international <a href="association%20football">football</a>er who played as a <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> and competed in the <a href="1912%20Summer%20Olympics">1912 Summer Olympics</a>. He was born in <a href="%C3%96hningen">Öhningen am Bodensee</a>. He was a member of the <a href="Football%20at%20the%201912%20Summer%20Olympics">German Olympic squad</a> and played one match in the main tournament as well as one match in the consolation tournament. He was killed during <a href="World%20War%20I">World War I</a>.
